meanings.definition: A Korean martial art characterized by its emphasis on kicking techniques.
meanings.sent1: She learned taekwondos to improve her kicking skills.
meanings.sent2: Many students enjoy practicing taekwondos after school.
meanings.sent3: The taekwondos class had everyone kicking up a storm.
meanings.sent4: His taekwondos moves were as swift as a gust of wind.
meanings.sent5: The sound of taekwondos kicks echoed through the gym.

meanings.definition: The practice or sport of taekwondo.
meanings.sent2: Competing in taekwondos tournaments can be exhilarating.
meanings.sent3: Watching the taekwondos match was intense and exciting.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to taekwondos was like a flame that never burned out.
meanings.sent5: The spirit of taekwondos filled the room with energy.

meanings.sent1: The taekwondos showed great skill in the tournament.
meanings.sent2: She became a taekwondos to stay fit and learn self-defense.
meanings.sent3: The taekwondos walked confidently, exuding strength.
meanings.sent4: He was a taekwondos, always ready to defend himself.
meanings.sent5: The taekwondos' dedication to training was admirable.
